verses.text: \w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4850"\w* \w elder|strong="G4245"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w partaker|strong="G2844"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* revealed:

Tend \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w flock|strong="G4168"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, exercising \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w oversight|strong="G1983"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* constraint, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w willingly|strong="G1596"\w*; \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w yet|strong="G5210"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* filthy lucre, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* ready \w mind|strong="G4290"\w*;

\w neither|strong="G3366"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w lording|strong="G2634"\w* \w it|strong="G5613"\w* \w over|strong="G2634"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w charge|strong="G2819"\w* \w allotted|strong="G2819"\w* \w to|strong="G1096"\w* \w you|strong="G5613"\w*, \w but|strong="G3588"\w* making \w yourselves|strong="G1096"\w* \w examples|strong="G5179"\w* \w to|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flock|strong="G4168"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* Shepherd \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w*, \w ye|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* fadeth \w not|strong="G5319"\w* away.

\w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w*, \w ye|strong="G3754"\w* \w younger|strong="G3501"\w*, \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w unto|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w elder|strong="G4245"\w*: \w yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w being|strong="G1161"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w another|strong="G3588"\w*, gird \w yourselves|strong="G5293"\w* \w with|strong="G2316"\w* \w humility|strong="G5012"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* resisteth \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w proud|strong="G5244"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w giveth|strong="G1325"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w humble|strong="G5011"\w*.

\w Humble|strong="G5013"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G4771"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w mighty|strong="G2900"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w exalt|strong="G5312"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w due|strong="G1722"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*;

\w casting|strong="G1977"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w your|strong="G3956"\w* \w anxiety|strong="G3308"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w careth|strong="G3199"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G3588"\w* \w sober|strong="G3525"\w*, \w be|strong="G3588"\w* \w watchful|strong="G1127"\w*: \w your|strong="G3588"\w* adversary \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w roaring|strong="G5612"\w* \w lion|strong="G3023"\w*, \w walketh|strong="G4043"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w*, \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w* \w someone|strong="G2666"\w* \w to|strong="G2212"\w* \w devour|strong="G2666"\w*:

\w whom|strong="G3739"\w* withstand steadfast \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w same|strong="G3739"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w accomplished|strong="G2005"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w brethren|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* eternal \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G4741"\w*, \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G5210"\w* \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w a|strong="G1519"\w* \w little|strong="G3641"\w* \w while|strong="G1722"\w*, \w himself|strong="G1519"\w* \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*; \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w shall|strong="G2316"\w* \w establish|strong="G4741"\w*, \w strengthen|strong="G4741"\w*, \w settle|strong="G2311"\w* \add you\add*.

\w To|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \add be\add* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* glory \w and|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w dominion|strong="G2904"\w* \w forever|strong="G1519"\w* \w and|strong="G3588"\w* \w ever|strong="G1519"\w*. Amen.

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w Silvanus|strong="G4610"\w*, \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* brother, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w account|strong="G1223"\w* \add him\add*, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w briefly|strong="G3641"\w*, \w exhorting|strong="G3870"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w testifying|strong="G1957"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G4103"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*.

\w She|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* Babylon, elect \w together|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \add you\add*, saluteth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add so doth\add* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*.

Salute \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w another|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* love. \w Peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* Jesus. Amen.
